## configurePineconeRetriever() function

Configures a Pinecone retriever.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function configurePineconeRetriever<EmbedderCustomOptions extends z.ZodTypeAny>(params: {
    indexId: string;
    clientParams?: PineconeConfiguration;
    textKey?: string;
    embedder: EmbedderArgument<EmbedderCustomOptions>;
    embedderOptions?: z.infer<EmbedderCustomOptions>;
}): import("@genkit-ai/ai/retriever").RetrieverAction<z.ZodObject<{
    k: z.ZodNumber;
    namespace: z.ZodOptional<z.ZodString>;
    filter: z.ZodOptional<z.ZodRecord<z.ZodString, z.ZodAny>>;
    sparseVector: z.ZodOptional<z.ZodEffects<z.ZodObject<{
        indices: z.ZodArray<z.ZodNumber, "many">;
        values: z.ZodArray<z.ZodNumber, "many">;
    }, "strip", z.ZodTypeAny, {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    }, {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    }>, {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    }, {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    }>>;
}, "strip", z.ZodTypeAny, {
    k: number;
    namespace?: string | undefined;
    filter?: Record<string, any> | undefined;
    sparseVector?: {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    } | undefined;
}, {
    k: number;
    namespace?: string | undefined;
    filter?: Record<string, any> | undefined;
    sparseVector?: {
        indices: number[];
        values: number[];
    } | undefined;
}>>;
```
